options.optionText: Oh God... WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO YOU?!
options.responseText: *spits blood, eyes rolling weakly* w-what... do you think? Hans... your little buddy... went... full psycho mode. *coughs violently* vault’s... one big... fucking bloodbath now.

followUpOptions.responseText: *choking on blood* Hide? You think I could just... crawl into a corner... *coughs violently* he killed... Boogie. I wasn’t gonna... sit around... and let that bastard... win.
*eyes glassy with tears* he... he was my best friend... my family... *gasping for air* He tried... we both did... *weak smile* but, I guess... friendship bracelets don’t stop bullets.

followUpOptions.optionText: You were brave to stand up to him.
followUpOptions.responseText: *laughs weakly, coughing up blood* Brave? Yeah... sure... call it brave. *sputters blood*
*eyes tearing up, struggling to breathe* He... he was the only one... who ever cared about me. *coughs violently* And now... he’s gone... *chokes, glaring weakly*

*glances at the bloody stump, smirking faintly through the pain* oh, this is just... Hans’ idea of a... handshake. *coughs up blood, voice weakening* Tried to block his axe... turns out... arms don’t grow back...

followUpOptions.optionText: I didn’t know he’d do this!
followUpOptions.responseText: *glaring weakly, blood dripping from her lips* Oh, you... didn't know? What... you think the swastikas... were for? *chokes sputtering blood* Idiot...

followUpOptions.optionText: Hans is a lunatic! I should’ve stopped him.
followUpOptions.responseText: *sarcastic snort, wincing in pain* Yeah, well... great timing. Real helpful now... *coughs*

followUpOptions.optionText: I’m so sorry, I never meant for this to happen.
followUpOptions.responseText: *glaring through the pain, coughing blood* You... you helped him, didn’t you? *chokes on a sob* You... brought him the gun. *voice breaking* This is... all on you.

followUpOptions.optionText: I didn’t think he’d go this far.
followUpOptions.responseText: *choking laugh, spitting blood* You didn’t think? Oh, well, great. Nobody... died because of you... just because you’re... dumb as rocks. *gasping* Feel better now?

followUpOptions.optionText: I’ll make this right. I swear.
followUpOptions.responseText: *eyes dulling, whispering faintly* Make it right? *choking laugh* Hans... made sure... there’s nothing left... to make right. You’re... just too late.

options.responseText: *laughs bitterly, blood dripping down her chin* Oh sure... Hans... just did us all... a favor, huh? *weak snarl* You’re as sick... as he is... you fucking psycho...
*her eyes widen* ...wait—no... ahh, you— *chokes* why...? *a wet gasp escapes as her body goes limp*
*whispering faintly, her voice fading* fuck you... and fuck Hans... I hope... you both rot in hell... *collapses, lifeless*
